org.gearvrf.animation.keyframe

Class GVRKeyFrameAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.animation.GVRAnimation
      • org.gearvrf.animation.keyframe.GVRKeyFrameAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrettyPrint

    public class GVRKeyFrameAnimation
extends GVRAnimation
implements PrettyPrint
    Represents animation based on a sequence of key frames.

      • animate

        protected void animate(GVRHybridObject target,
                       float ratio)
        Description copied from class: GVRAnimation
        Override this to create a new animation. Generally, you do this by changing some property of the mTarget, and letting GVRF handle screen updates automatically.
        Specified by:
        animate in class GVRAnimation
        Parameters:
        target - The GVRF object to animate
        ratio - The start state is 0; the stop state is 1.
